channel.title: Need Help From Someone Who's A Fairly Well Coder, Please Read!
channel.description:
I'm coding a 718 source, and this is my first one ever :p and its so much different from a 317 :p and I was wondering if someone could explain to me how to duel wield 2 handed weapons.
Ex.: I want to duel wield primal mauls on my server, and I have no clue how I would even go about doing that. :p
I tried looking it up on Google and that didn't help.. :p so I would greatly appreciate a little help ;p point me in the right direction so I can figure it out.
Thanks ! - Dustin

item.title: Need Help From Someone Who's A Fairly Well Coder, Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“dustin122711, post:1, topic:471518”]I’m coding a 718 source, and this is my first one ever and its so much different from a 317 and I was wondering if someone could explain to me how to duel wield 2 handed weapons.

Ex.: I want to duel wield primal mauls on my server, and I have no clue how I would even go about doing that.

I tried looking it up on Google and that didn’t help… so I would greatly appreciate a little help ;p point me in the right direction so I can figure it out.

                                                                    Thanks !
                                                                         - Dustin[/quote]

Tips: don’t make a misleading title.
explain the problem fully (you did that)
If you can’t program a 718, and know you are pretty good at it. Why not make a 317 loading Revision ### and make it have dual wield?

On-Topic. I haven’t someone do this on a 718. You can try ripping from a 739+

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help From Someone Who's A Fairly Well Coder, Please Read!

sadly no but its really hard but it would work on 739’s tho ;D

item.title: Need Help From Someone Who's A Fairly Well Coder, Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @dustin122711 dustin122711
item.description:
@dustin122711 wrote:

[quote=“emptyone999, post:2, topic:471518”]Hi, add me emptyone99 i can code your server i have my own rsps and will gadly help you
just respond and say i added u :D[/quote]
Do you know how to make 2 handed mauls duel wield-able? Because that’s all I need to know, I have pretty much everything else I need done taken care of.

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:3, topic:471518”][quote author=emptyone999 link=topic=589097.msg4175043#msg4175043 date=1354893550]
Hi, add me emptyone99 i can code your server i have my own rsps and will gadly help you
just respond and say i added u
[/quote]

Personally, I wouldn’t take any help from someone who talks like this…

And if you cannot code a 718 source, go back to 317s and gradually work your way up.[/quote]
It’s not that I don’t know how to code a 718, its just I don’t know how to go about making 2 handed mauls duel wield-able. Do you? Because I’d greatly appreciate the help.

Read full topic
